name: Forehand Drive
shortDescription: Hit above line, bounce before service box
description: Practice hitting consistent length by targeting the cut line having the ball bounce between the service box and back wall. Try to avoid hitting the side wall.

name: Forehand Defence
shortDescription: Target the outline, lifting ball. Bounce before back wall
description: Practice lifting the ball to get out of trouble by targeting the outline and having the ball bounce before the back wall. Try to avoid hitting the side wall.

name: Forehand Volley
description: Stand on the service line to volley the ball to yourself. Target the cut line and aim for the ball to travel in a flat trajectory.

name: Forehand Drop
description: At the front of the court, drop the ball to yourself. Get your racquet back between shots and avoid the side wall.

name: Backhand Drive
shortDescription: Hit above line, bounce before service box
description: Practice hitting consistent length by targeting the cut line having the ball bounce between the service box and back wall. Try to avoid hitting the side wall.

name: Backhand Defence
shortDescription: Target the outline, lifting ball. Bounce before back wall
description: Practice lifting the ball to get out of trouble by targeting the outline and having the ball bounce before the back wall. Try to avoid hitting the side wall.

name: Backhand Volley
description: Stand on the service line to volley the ball to yourself. Target the cut line and aim for the ball to travel in a flat trajectory.

name: Backhand Drop
description: At the front of the court, drop the ball to yourself. Get your racquet back between shots and avoid the side wall.

name: Warm Up
shortDescription: Warm up your body and the ball
description: Run through your  warm-up routine to get you ready for practice.

name: Cool Down
shortDescription: Cool down your muscles to avoid injury
description: Run through your cool-down routine to help your recovery.

name: Freestyle
description: Keep the ball alive for as long as possible. Try out unorthodox shorts and keep adjusting by staying light on your feet..

name: Court Sprints
description: Improve your fitness and court coverage. Run 20 lengths in under a minute with no more than 60 seconds rest. Take 7 strides for each length, turning the same way at each end.

name: Ghosting
description: Practice your movement and court coverage. Start on the T and cover the back, middle, and front of the court on the forehand and backhand side.

name: Rest
description: Catch your breath, towel off and have a drink if you need.
